mapper.select: select ip,sensorId,sensor_type,maxvalues,maxtime,minvalue,mintime,avgvalue,statistictime from ${tablename} WHERE statistictime>DATE_SUB(#{time},INTERVAL 1 HOUR) AND statistictime<=#{time} and remark=1

select ip,sensorId,sensor_type,maxvalues,maxtime,minvalue,mintime,avgvalue,statistictime from ${tablename} WHERE statistictime>DATE_SUB(#{time},INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND statistictime<=#{time} and remark=1
mapper.insert:
insert into t_analog_statistics(ip,sensorId,sensor_type,statistictime,maxvalues,maxtime,minvalue,mintime,status,debug,remark,avgvalue) values
(#{s.ip},#{s.sensorId},#{s.sensor_type},#{s.statistictime},#{s.maxvalues},#{s.maxtime},#{s.minvalue},#{s.mintime},#{s.status},#{s.debug},#{s.remark},#{s.avgvalue})
on duplicate key update maxvalues=values(maxvalues),maxtime=values(maxtime),minvalue=values(minvalue),mintime=values(mintime),status=values(status),debug=values(debug),avgvalue=values(avgvalue)
